summary.title: Asuite
summary.description: A sample model of a web application, with a queue-decoupled background process.

threats.title: Low privilege user can access to log data.
An attacker can see error messages with security sensitive content
Users steal somebody else credentials.
Upload a malicious file via iFiles
threats.mitigation:
- Filter files by type
- set a whitelist of allowed file extensions.
- Scan the files uploaded via Antivirus API or command line.

threats.title: XSS
Manipulation of the url or form to get data that it shouldn't be allowed.
threats.mitigation: - Implement access control on data that has been requested.

threats.title: SQL Injection Attack
threats.mitigation: - Implement Cloudflare in front of Asuite.

threats.title: The asuite team uses a vulnerable third party library.
threats.mitigation: We are using Veracode to monitor the security of the library that we use.

threats.title: User runs unefficient query agains the database
threats.mitigation:
- Setting limits to how much data it can returns.
- Timeout on query

threats.title: Data is unencrypted
threats.mitigation: Encrypt the connection and data between two endpoints.

threats.title: Attacker can authenticate as different principle confusing the logs.
XSS Embedded on Email from client.
threats.mitigation: - Sanitization of email before to add the data to the database.

threats.title: Upload a malicious file via iFiles
threats.mitigation:
- Whitelist the extensions allowed to be stored on the system.
- Scan the file uploaded with the Antivirus API

threats.title: Email Flooding sending millions of emails.
threats.mitigation: - Check the email amount on the Mail box and if greater than X send an email to helpdesk to fix the issue.

threats.title: An unthorized user can view custom report
threats.mitigation: - Implement Access Control for the report request.

threats.title: An administrator can remove the logs from the system
threats.mitigation: - We should write the logs and then ship them to an external log repo.

threats.title: A user can steal credentials and upload any malicious file to the system.
threats.mitigation:
- Antivirus on the system
- FTPS
- Block FTP public access

threats.title: Lock people by bruteforcing their credentials from asuite
threats.mitigation: - Implement counter of bad logins attemps per ip  in a certain type, we should block the IP (add it to a black list) and then redirect.

threats.title: Client authentication is subverted
An attacker can read sensitive information from the local files.
